text: The Baojun 510 is a subcompact Crossover SUV made by SAIC-GM-Wuling under Baojun since 2017. == History and Features == The Baojun 510 made its debut at the Guangzhou Auto Show in 2016 while it was launched in 2017 the 510 is positioned under the Baojun 530/560. it has a 1.5 liter petrol engine with a 6-speed manual transmission and a 5-speed automatic CVT transmission it was improved in 2019. the SUV became in 2018 the best selling Crossover in China and later the best selling car from Baojun. it also became the best selling new car nameplate in the world. == Markets == The Baojun 510 is sold mainly in the Chinese market but in 2020 SAIC-GM-Wuling started exporting to Latin America (later Mexico and Middle East in 2021) the facelifted 510 under the Chevrolet brand as the Chevrolet Groove. == Discontinuation == In 2019 the Baojun RS-3 was launched even though it acts as a replacement it is sold alongside the 510 as a more premium option. == Sales == Year China Chile 2017 358,877 2018 361,403 2019 158,201 2020 60,570 2021 32,991 9,007 2022 5,591 2023 6,009 == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Baojun 510
